channel.title: Bioshock: Infinite
channel.description:
So they're making another Bioshock but this time about a city in the sky instead of underwater.
[url]https://www.gametrailers.com/video/debut-trailer-bioshock-infinite/702794[/url]
[url]https://kotaku.com/5607451/bioshock-infinite-goes-beyond-the-sea--into-the-skies[/url]
I like it, what do you guys think?

item.title: Bioshock: Infinite

“He is already angry!!!”

item.title: Bioshock: Infinite
item.dc:creator: Dias
item.description:
blue:

Wtf man, you high ? This post makes no sense,and i will just ignore teh fact you get one bilion logs for backstory in bioshock O_o

The guy’s just an idiot, the type who thinks that if a game doesn’t force you to sit through cutscenes or long scripted sequences than it doesn’t have a story. Just ignore him.

item.description:

Who wants to bet that the game’s ending will involve the sky city epically falling out of the sky?

item.title: Bioshock: Infinite
item.dc:creator: Someonerandm
item.description:
bigfan421:

oh, so you Probably wont be playing Duke Nukem Forever then eh? Sucks to be you.

Its different there. Here its actualy trying to express emotion that I as the player will probably not feel. In DN:F, I’ll be feeling badass masscring aliens and the voicing will reflect that. Plus, there is a reason that Half Life will be preferable to DN:F.

In any case, I like the racist overtones.

Read full topic

item.title: Bioshock: Infinite
item.dc:creator: av3nger
item.description:
Bioshock is the game of no story. Beat the first one…I do not like most alternate reality storylines that don’t first branch off of our reality. Meaning: NO BACKSTORY or story from before the events = suck. Half-Life 2 however branches off of our reality. One day you are working you know, bam, aliens…Then the story comes. Of course if you count the fictional portal facility built in the 80’s, then there is an exception. But I am sure they could make up a reasonable storyline for that.

Franchises such as WOW. WOW has a lot of storyline elements yes…but the execution of the storyline and repetitiveness and the fact that the game “addicts” people ruins the storyline and any real like for the game for me anyway. It has a shit ton of directions it can go. On the other hand…warhammer is retarded with its “Orks (Warhammer franchise uses both “Orcs” and “Orks”) come from mushrooms” shit. What the fuck are they thinking? Were they on LSD shrooms?

Read full topic

item.title: Bioshock: Infinite
item.dc:creator: Medevilae
item.description:
Someonerandm:

The gameplay looks good, the story seems insane, which is good, but the talking protagonist annoys me to no end. I recognize it can add more emotion, but I just don’t like them.

I REALLY like where the story is headed. Like the old Bioshocks, on steroids. I thought it would just be “Rapture in the Sky” but it seems to be it’s own game. Definitely.

Read full topic
